title: Permanently Banned for toxicity
body:

Congrats You Fed: im not im going straight damage

Game 3
In-Game

Congrats You Fed: really what is this botlane

Congrats You Fed: gj guys

(FOR REFERENCE THE ZED SAID "GOD THIS BOTLANE" THEN WE STARTED CARRYING AND THE MF AND I STARTED SAYING IT BECAUSE OF HOW TOXIC HE WAS BEING)


Okay so let me say that I did get a 2 week suspension and I think I got one chat ban before that. Now the only game that i think should be viewed as toxic in the slightest out of these three is the 3rd one. After I got my 2 week ban and my brother got his account permabanned (reduced to 2 week sentence) I decided that I just needed to type way less so i completely turned all chat off. Now I really think that the ban system needs reformed because of how its automated and not reviewed, but i will leave that out so this isn't biased. I'm not even that upset I just feel i've been done wrong by the system. I completely reformed, did what riot wanted me to do, and i got reported in these games because I guess I said things they didn't want to hear. I have my all chat turned off and I have not flamed a single person since I got my 2 week , i have even been getting probably 50% more honors for friendliness. Really don't know what to do.

replies.body: When something looks hard to believe, it usually is.  I call BS, that chat log has been altered.

nope unfortunately it isn't. as someone else said I guess you really have no chance and you should edit the game code so you can't even hit enter to type, because anything is bannable after a 2 week suspension.

> muted and reported

Actually do it next time instead of just talking about it.

Not that there is a next time..

Whatever they are doing, meeting them and then going farther wont help.
i'm pretty sure telling other teammates to report someone else is reportable in it of itself (harassment)
aaaaaaaaaaand thats whats wrong with this community
maybe, but im not the one who can judge here.  im just the one that sends out the report.
i did mute the person but his butt buddy started talking
And why didn't you mute his friend aswell?

Games 1 & 2 aren't the worst chat I've seen, but they're not exactly clean, either. There's some stuff in there that isn't really OK.

If you decide to come back, I'd recommend focusing on having a quicker mute button. You don't need to say anything to people who are being jerks; just mute them. When you get into a back-and-forth it makes a bad situation worse. It's bad enough to have to deal with a jerk on the team without also having to deal with another teammate egging them on.

were you off a recent 14 day ban?

because they give you a notification that any further issues will result in a perma ban

i'm not sure how many matches you need to play (without getting reported) to de-escalate into a point where you aren't at risk for being perma banned

then yeah, this was well warranted 

I think you have to play somewhere in the realm of like 300+ matches without being reported for your behavior (matchmade only) to get a de-escalation on your punishment tier

I mean if u check the report options, giving up (if a surrender doesn't go thru) is considered an offense. 
On the other hand, I think a permaban was massive overkill if these 3 games weren't close to consecutive.
I've said far worse things to teammates but only like 1 in 12ish when teammates are str8 up absurd.
depends, saying im giving up on this game and sitting in the fountain are 2 things, people say they give up and keep trying all the time.
really only game 3 on this could be considered toxic in my opinon, seems like the other 2 are pretty subjective, like there's not much i see that warrants punishment on 2 of the 3

The system is a failure. I know what I'm saying. 

You will get probably minused  to death, but that's because majority of people here are NPC's. 
The reality is that tribunal needs to be bring back, becuase Riot right now bans for "flame", meanwhile not reacting to trolling at all.
